text:
Storyline Bloopers in the Gossip Girl TV Series Edit

In Season 4, Blair and Serena are walking through Columbia's campus and Blair is holding different colored folders then it switches to Serena then back to Blair and the folders are in a whole different order.

In Season 4 , when Jenny returns and steals Serena 's sim card, they don't think about the fact that when Gossip Girl texts them all somehow Serena's new sim gets the Gossip Girl blasts even though she won't be on the mail list.

In Poison Ivy, Serena tells Dan her father went to Harvard. But, in Belles de Jour, she tells Blair she wanted to go to Columbia because her father studied there.





In the Pilot, Nates haircut notibly changes between scenes, from longish at Blair's party (when Serena returns), to trimmed while jogging with his father, back to longish when eating sushi with Blair.





In Pilot Chuck takes the bus with Nate and Dan to school, but in every other episode from this point on Chuck rides around in his driven stretch-limousine and Dan walks with Jenny.





In Pilot, the entire Waldorf apartment is completly different to what it looks like in every episode after.

Blair's bedroom in Pilot is a different color to every other episode.





In Pilot Chuck speaks of his mother as though she is still alive.

In Pilot the Gossip Girl page looks completely different to every other episode.
